================================
## Public Work and Government Services (PWGSC) Tender Notice

Title: Snow Plow Trucks (Heavy Tandem) Contract

### Solicitation Details

| Solicitation Number | WS4389343698 |
| --- | --- |
| Publication Date | January 24, 2024 |
| Tender Closing Date | March 20, 2024, 14:00 EST |
| Amendment Number | 3 |
| Amendment Date | March 12, 2024 |

### Contract Information

| Contract Number | 5P435-230044 | 
| --- | --- |
| Contracting Entity | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) |
| End User Entity | Parks Canada Agency (PC) |
| Regions of Delivery | Alberta, British Columbia |
| Expected Contract Start Date | None |
| Expected Contract End Date | March 31, 2027 |

### Tender Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) invites bids for Heavy Tandem Snow Plow Trucks. The selection criteria is based on the lowest price. 

The following trade agreements apply: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-China Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

### Mandatory Specifications

Please refer to the Annex – Statement of Requirement for a complete list of mandatory specifications.

### Important Notice

Please note that all bids must be submitted by March 20, 2024, at 14:00 EST. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

* Name: Amanda Jordan (PWGSC)
* Email: [Amanda.Jordan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Amanda.Jordan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Contact Method: Please use the Ariba Discovery website to submit bids and contact the contracting entity.

For more information, please visit: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18608917?extsite=MTg2MDg5MTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: The notice will be available on the Ariba Discovery website until the tender closing date.
